name: Oldowan Pre-Alpha
description:
Oldowan is a casual survival sandbox game that is focused on very early humanity and how it developed. The crafting and items are all based on real practices, but the survival aspects are relaxed.  This pre-alpha version has removed endgame content that will be available once the early access is released.

Features include:

  • Foraging
  • Crafting
  • Building
  • Mining
  • Fishing
  • Boating
  • Gardening
  • Exploring
  • Hunting
